name: Cursed to Hop
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 51: "Every 10 Seconds"

In this auto-scrolling beat 'em up, play as a band of rabbit adventurers defeating dangerous dimensional monsters. 

Unfortunately for the party,  they've been cursed by an evil dimension-hopping kangaroo to be pulled into a different plane of existence every 10 seconds. Be on your fluffy toes because those dire wolves may turn into fiery hellhounds or magical fox spirits at any moment!

Code and Art: Me
